thread.title: Alamo Drafthouse plans 'Big Lebowski' quote-along dinner party
thread.title_full: Alamo Drafthouse plans 'Big Lebowski' quote-along dinner party

author: William Kerns
title: Alamo Drafthouse plans 'Big Lebowski' quote-along dinner party
text:
Alamo Drafthouse plans 'Big Lebowski' quote-along dinner party 'Big Lebowski,' considered a cult classic, now inspires dinner party Posted: October 9, 2015 - 12:00am By William Kerns A-J MEDIA ENTERTAINMENT EDITOR 
The quote-along version of “The Big Lebowski” will be screened at 7:30 p.m. Wednesday at the Alamo Drafthouse, 120 W. Loop 289. 
Making the evening more special, the screening will be preceded by a “Big Lebowski” dinner party. 
Tickets are $40. 
Alamo Drafthouse spokesman Robert Saucedo shared the evening’s menu in advance. The courses include: 
■ Thai Rug: Crispy flatbread with cilantro-peanut pesto, pickled daikon radish, carrot and bean sprouts; topped with butter poached shrimp in a lemongrass, ginger and vodka glaze to really tie the plate together. Served with The Dude’s White Russian. 
■ Logjammin’: Coffee and spice crusted pork tenderloin, stuffed with carmelized peaches, spinach and almonds; accompanied by roasted garlic smashed purple potatoes and vodka cream sauce. Served with a special craft beer selection from Firestone Walker Brewing. 
■ Toe with Polish: Crispy cannoli shell stuffed with ricotta, avocado and pistachio filling; resting in a pool of Lingonberry syrup. Served with a White Russian milkshake. 
Call the Alamo Drafthouse at 368-8887 for reservations and more details. Early reservations may be advised. 
william.kerns@lubbockonline.com
